overview: His itching was something completely different from the writing box...The famous short storyteller Richard Mark is in the process of writing his new hot love novel. He rents himself in a house in the mountains and looks forward to the inspiring peace and quiet.But it's not going to be quite as he intended.Disturbing moments both help and hinder! We follow Rickard's alter ego on a breathtaking erotic and romantic journey in a bygone era in the old Wild Western. The short story rickard writes is shaped as his alter ego explores life's erotic encounters.Present or past? It doesn't matter to a life-lover!
title: The Novelist
